about.title: Aaron Guo
about.description: Software Engineer, Head of Products, Drummer.
about.subtitle: Product leader building AI-native execution systems
about.bio1: Hi there! I'm Aaron, juggling pixels and product roadmap as a Head of Products & Software Engineer at Mawer Investment Management. By day, I wrangle complex challenges in the investment world; by night (and often weekends!), you'll find me diving deep into the realms of Javascript, Typescript, Vue, and Nuxt, always eager to build something new or solve a tricky puzzle.
about.bio2: I'm passionate about building pragmatic systems for strategy, alignment, and delivery. I write playbooks on execution, leadership, and AI workflows based on what I've learned leading product and engineering teams.
about.now1: I'm currently focused on building AI-native execution systems that help product and engineering teams move faster without sacrificing quality.
about.now2: I'm also exploring how to redesign life with AIâ€”finding balance among family, health, career, and personal growth.
about.aboutMe: Hi there! I'm Aaron, juggling pixels and product roadmap as a Head of Products & Software Engineer at Mawer Investment Management. By day, I wrangle complex challenges in the investment world; by night (and often weekends!), you'll find me diving deep into the realms of Javascript, Typescript, Vue, and Nuxt, always eager to build something new or solve a tricky puzzle. Welcome to my corner of the web where I share my explorations and insights!

aiNative.title: AI Native
aiNative.description: Exploring how AI transforms my daily life.
aiNative.intro: This page is a playful showcase of the ways I'm weaving AI into my workflow and creativity.
aiNative.daily1: ChatGPT drafts my ideas and answers random questions.
aiNative.daily2: GitHub Copilot helps finish code faster.
aiNative.vision: Eventually it'll become my personal branding hub for everything AI â€“ tutorials, projects, and experiences.

drum.title: Drum
drum.description: My drumming journey and Drum Next - an AI-native drumming app
drum.drumNextDescription: Drum Next is an AI-native drumming app currently in MVP stage. It helps drummers learn, practice, and share their drumming journey with intelligent features powered by AI.

rss.title: Subscribe via RSS
rss.description: Get new posts delivered to your RSS reader. Twice a month: one playbook, one lesson, one tool. Practical insights on product execution, leadership, and AI-native workflows.
rss.emailComingSoon: ðŸ“§ Email newsletter coming later. For now, RSS is the best way to stay updated.
rss.privacy: No tracking. No spam. Pure content.

subscribe.title: Subscribe to Updates
subscribe.description: Stay updated with new posts via RSS. Email newsletter coming later.
subscribe.playbooksDesc: Step-by-step guides for product execution and leadership
subscribe.lessonsDesc: Real-world insights from building products and teams
subscribe.rssExplanation: RSS (Really Simple Syndication) is an open standard for subscribing to content. Instead of checking websites manually, your RSS reader automatically fetches new posts from all your favorite sites in one place.
subscribe.rssBenefit1: No email clutter - read in your dedicated RSS reader
subscribe.rssBenefit2: No tracking or analytics - your privacy is protected
subscribe.rssBenefit3: Own your subscription - not controlled by any platform
subscribe.rssBenefit4: Works offline - download posts to read later

start.title: Start Here
start.description: New to this site? Start with these curated posts and resources.

By day, I wrangle complex challenges in the investment world; by night (and often weekends!), you'll find me diving deep into the realms of Javascript, Typescript, Vue, and Nuxt, always eager to build something new or solve a tricky puzzle.
